properties.name: securecoding.app.name
properties.description: The name of the SecureCoding application.

properties.name: securecoding.app.url
properties.description: The external url of the application.

properties.name: securecoding.challenges.verbose-load
properties.description: Allows the application to load challenges verbosely.

properties.name: securecoding.compiler.node.generate-packages
properties.description: Allows the application to generate necessary external dependencies.

properties.name: securecoding.mail.bot.name
properties.description: The name to be used for emails.

properties.name: securecoding.mail.require-verify
properties.description: Forces verification process upon new users.

properties.name: securecoding.mail.prompt-login
properties.description: Informs users when they perform a login.
